name: Jack The Giant
description:
You have one mission:
Get down as fast as you can!

Make Jack jump from cloud to cloud to climb down the big tree.
Sounds like an easy task?
Watch out for the dark clouds or you will never see ground again.

Choose between different difficulties, severity determines the speed!

Collect coins to reach highscore, collect lives to complete your mission and to avoid living forever alone on treetops!

Fun and easygoing addictive game for all ages.
